name: You are in a room(s)
description:
You woke up in a normal ro- You woke up in a destro- You woke up in stra- You woke up in- YOU WOKE UP IN A ROOM(S).

Can you get out?

Scavenge for what you can and maybe you'll find your way.

Controls:
Basic WASD and mouse to move and look around, mouse click to interact. ESC to quit

Made by Joe R (3D modeling, texturing, and lighting) and Derek H (programming, audio, and post-processing), for Ludum Dare 51
